body:
mostly serves to increase the size of this  too-short recipe `</joke>`. 

The variants were obviously not written with achieving a one-to-one mapping to roots build options and that's probably a good thing, because mainly they should be for installing root with spack. Even if it is not 100% for this reason, being a bit more accurate when running `spack external find root`  may still prove useful in some scenarios.
title: root: add determine_variants
